mapper.select: SELECT u.ID FROM users u WHERE u.uuid=#{uuids}
SELECT c.level_id FROM user_level_relation c WHERE c.user_id =#{userId} AND c.yn=1 AND c.status =1
SELECT m.ratio FROM meta_obtain_integral m WHERE m.user_level=#{leId} AND m.scene_key IN('iQMrkC4L','sdQbEZSe','rgJt3Vnk','D8TKEd9L')
SELECT integral FROM meta_obtain_integral WHERE scene_key=#{skey}
SELECT c.name FROM meta_user_level c WHERE c.ID=#{leId}

SELECT u.create_time,u.actual_name,u.company_name,u.company_duties,u.ID,u.phonenumber,u.`desc`,u.identity_type,u.create_time,w.nick_name,i.investors_type FROM users u right join users_weixin w on w.user_id = u.ID left join investors i on w.user_id = i.user_id where u.actual_name is not null or w.nick_name is not null order by u.create_time desc limit #{startPage},#{pageSize} ;

select u.actual_name,u.headpic,u.headpic_real,u.company_duties,w.nick_name,w.openId,t.token from users u right join users_weixin w on u.ID = w.user_id left join user_token t on w.user_id = t.user_id where u.ID = #{userId}

select u.actual_name,u.headpic,u.headpic_real,u.company_name,u.company_duties,w.nick_name from users u right join user_token t on u.ID = t.user_id left join users_weixin w on t.user_id = w.user_id where t.token = #{token}

select u.actual_name, u.company_name, u.company_duties from users u where 1=1
and actual_name like concat(concat("%",#{searchWord}),"%")

SELECT case when u.actual_name is null then (case when uw.nick_name is null then "" else uw.nick_name end) else u.actual_name end actual_name, case when u.headpic_real is null then (case when u.headpic is null then "" else u.headpic end) else u.headpic_real end headpic_real, u.company_duties, u.uuid FROM users u right join users_weixin uw on u.ID = uw.user_id where u.actual_name != "" and u.actual_name is not null and u.uuid in #{item}
